Name: Chronicle of Daneya
About the game: Chronicle of Danae tells the story about Luchezar â€“ the failed heir to the throne, who buried his father and was mired in the depths of a bloody war. Will Luchezar be able to reverse a series of failures and regain his Kingdom, or will he die on the battlefield? This is what the Chronicle will tell us. Immerse yourself in the world of medieval fantasy with a pleasant atmosphere and music. Assemble a team of loyal followers to reclaim the throne. Make decisions that affect the fate of the entire Kingdom. Solve riddles and be smart on the way to the goal. Be prepared to take responsibility for every step you take. Feel like a keeper of history and wisdom of the whole realm.
